instructions.title: Instructions for the AI Real State Agent
instructions.description: Ask the agent for help to find the perfect home.
instructions.prefill: I want to buy a house with a pool in Miami for less than 1 million dollars. Can you help me?

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API key
openaiApiKey.description: The API key for accessing OpenAI. You can get it from OpenAI platform.

model.title: GPT model
model.description: Select a GPT model. See models overview. Keep in mind that each model has different pricing and features.
